title._content: Image taken from page 328 of 'The Hand-book to Arizona: its resources, history ... and scenery. ... Illustrated. Accompanied with a new map of the territory'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Hand-book to Arizona: its resources, history ... and scenery. ... Illustrated. Accompanied with a new map of the territory" Author: HINTON, Richard Josiah. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10408.bb.41.", "British Library DSC MFE/33/21019 *1*" Page: 328 Place of Publishing: San Francisco Date of Publishing: 1878 Publisher: App. ci. Payot, Upham & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001689786 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
